title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Up in the Air
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens, Dan Kois and John Swansburg discuss Up in the Air.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
